/usr/bin/c++ -O3 -DNDEBUG CMakeFiles/dx8_triangle.dir/main.cpp.o -o dx8_triangle  -Wl,-rpath,/home/djs/lvgl_osmesa_llvm6/build/mesa-install/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu:/home/djs/lvgl_osmesa_llvm6/build/llvm-install/lib ../../ext/dx8gl/libdx8gl.a ../../liblvgl.a ../lvgl_platform/liblvgl_platform.a -ldl ../../mesa-install/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOSMesa.so ../../llvm-install/lib/libLLVM-20.so -lpthread -ldl -lm ../../liblvgl.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libSM.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libICE.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXext.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libSDL2.so
